channel.title: Right-click menu
channel.description:
When you right click on people in my server its odd because for the admins it says Attack, walk here, ban, Trade with, and kick. But it doesnt do anything. i was hoping that someone could tell me how i can make it so the menu is like this: attack, walk here, follow, trade with, and kick. But i want the kick to actually work!
please someone help me :O
Thanks - Maxim
